comment._content: Is that his brother just behind him to the right?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Carnegie in 1913 was meeting with a British delegation planning to celebrate a century of peaceful relations between the U S and Britain, and the U S and Canada:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3121126254/in/photostream/]

In 1910, Carnegie's gift of ten million dollars had established the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, a think tank headquartered in New York City, now with branches in The Hague and in Moscow.
